snippet: The International Committee of the Red Cross said Monday that it had started an aid operation to deliver emergency food supplies to about 160,000 people in northern Mali.
abstract: International Committee of the Red Cross says that it has started an aid operation to deliver emergency food supplies to about 160,000 people in northern Mali, affected by drought and fighting between radical Islamists, rebels and the government.
lead_paragraph: The International Committee of the Red Cross said Monday that it had started an aid operation to deliver emergency food supplies to about 160,000 people in northern Mali.

headline.main: Mali: Red Cross Prepares Food Aid
headline.print_headline: Mali: Red Cross Prepares Food Aid

keywords.value: International Committee of the Red Cross
